kolambaa wishwa widyalaye sinhala anshaye mahacharyawaraya lesa katayuthu kala aduru thuma wasara 2000 di sewayen wishrama labuwe sammanitha mahacharyawarayaku lesayi. 2003 wasaredi deshamanya janadhipathi sammanayen pidum lada ethuma 2007 wasare patan thayilanthaye shri lanka thanapathi dhurayata pathwa giya. 2011 awasanaya dakwa ema thanathura daru mahacharya thuma eratata pathwu kalapiya thanapathi warun athara siti ekama bauddha thanapathiwaraya lesath, ekama mahacharyawaraya lesath thayilantha rajuge suwishesha agayimata pathra wuna.

shri lankawe sunami wani siduwim, saha landan uman bomba praharayan mage jiwithayata kelinma sambandha wi athi bawa soya ganimen pasuwa, apayojana, wadhahinsa saha yuddha nonawathwa sitima wani dewal nisa, mama jathyanthara aparadha adhikaranaye kriyakarithwaya pilibandawa gaweshanaya kota soya gaththemi. 2007 sapthambar masaye di mama owunta lipiyak liyu athara, owun ma wenuwen naduwak gonukota athi bawata prathicharayak labuni. 2007 sapthambar 23 dinathi lipiya.
